broadcast_transaction_confirm_details_co: 이 거래의 세부 정보를 검토하고 아래 버튼을 클릭하여 거래를 서명하고 방송(브로드캐스트) 하세요.
broadcast_transaction_import_file_conten: Select a signed transaction file to begin
broadcast_transaction_import_json_label: Paste the transaction JSON object here..
broadcast_transaction_invalid_error: The file or string that was uploaded is invalid.
broadcast_transaction_not_signed: 서명 되지 않은 거래를 방송(브로드캐스트) 할수 없습니다.
broadcast_transaction_note: Please note that the transaction must be signed in order for it to be broadcasted.
